intro: Pterogastra minor, commonly known as the lesser pterogastra, is a species of flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its slender, branched stems and small, greenish-white flowers arranged in umbels. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments, such as woodlands and stream banks. Its leaves are pinnately divided, with a delicate, fern-like appearance. Pterogastra minor is known for its medicinal properties, particularly in traditional herbal remedies.
